frameImage<-function(img, framecount) {
  framed <- cbind( imag[,rev(1:framecount)], img, img[,rev(197:216)] )
  canvas(x=c(1,40+216),y=c(1,198), asp=1)
  rasterImage(framed, 1, 1, 40+216, 198)
}
